{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_BspiAttack}} {{doomwiki|A_BspiAttack}} '''A_BspiAttack'''
(no parameters)
The attack of Doom's [[Classes:Arachnotron|Arachnotron]]. This shoots an [[Classes:ArachnotronPlasma|ArachnotronPlasma]] missile.
== Examples == This example is taken straight from Doom's Arachnotron.
Missile: BSPI A 20 bright [[A_FaceTarget]] BSPI G 4 bright [[A_BspiAttack]] // See [[Classes:ArachnotronPlasma|ArachnotronPlasma]] BSPI H 4 bright BSPI H 1 bright [[A_SpidRefire]] goto Missile+1
